subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1613, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi!

Can you please explain me how to Connect this device to SimHub? Through
your own application the haptics barely work on AMS2 and doesn’t work at
all on Iracing. As advertised, it was mentioned that it’s compatible with
SimHub. Thank you.

W dniu pt., 11 lip 2025 o 21:59 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> napisał(a):

> Hello Tomasz, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomasz Bogdan,    Just download version 9.9.3 of SIMHUB, then go to the Device section and add the SIMSONN device.
